ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Skopje

TYPE_AND_ACTIVITIES.TYPE_OF_CONTRACTING_AUTHORITY_OTHER: Legal entities established to meet the needs of public interest – Article 4 paragraph 1 indent b) of the Law — Education

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Procurement of services for hiring personnel to perform hotel and catering activities for the needs of the Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Skopje – Congress Centre Ohrid

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Procurement of services for hiring personnel to perform hotel and catering activities for the needs of the Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Skopje – Congress Centre Ohrid

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— Certificate that any competent authority has not initiated bankruptcy procedure,
— Certificate that any competent authority has not initiated liquidation procedure,
— Certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public payments issued by competent authority in the country where the economic operator has been registered in,

— Certificate from the Register of Penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that there is no minor penalty which prohibits participation in public announcement, public procurements contracts and contract for public-private partnership awarding procedures,
— Certificate from Register of Penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that there is no effective conviction for temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain activity,

— Certificate that there is no effective conviction by which infringement sanction has been imposed on – interdiction for professional activities, activities or duties, i.e. temporary interdiction of separate activity realization.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To be able to participate in the electronic auction, you need to register in the ESPP.

More detailed information about electronic auction: The contracting authority will use electronic auction as the final stage in the open procedure. The subject of the electronic auction is the total price including all expenses and discounts, without VAT. The initial price of the electronic auction is the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted in the initial stage of the procedure. Invitations to participate in the auction will be submitted electronically through the ESPP after full evaluation of the initial offer, to all economic operators who have submitted acceptable bids in the first stage of the procedure and are registered in the ESPP.

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University in Skopje — Rector’s office
